title: Question on World's Tokens
body:
I currently have 195 tokens, looking at another 55 before this week is over (presumably), that would leave me with 250 tokens.

It costs 440 tokens for the Champ Ashe Border + Icon and Gold Chroma + Ward Skin, is it possible for me to get both of these before the event is over?

Is it possible for me to get an additional 190 tokens after the end of this week (and the addition of more quests next week), before the event is over? How long do I have until the event is over?

(I have the mission pass)

replies.body: The event will end on Nov 5th and you should have more then enough tokens if you are doing all the missions each week with the pass.  This [link ](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/esports/esports-editorial/worlds-2017-missions-loot)has the full breakdown of how many tokens you can get each week.
Lew to the rescue!  Let us know if you have any questions.  ^^

> [{quoted}](name=Porocles,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=XOsH7zvf,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2017-10-10T20:48:00.187+0000)
>
> Lew to the rescue!  Let us know if you have any questions.  ^^

Thanks though, the link definitely helped a lot from the other guy.

I actually like this kind of mission/reward system, it's an interesting addition to the game
